channel.title: Making Spawners not lose items on death [PI]
channel.description: Can someone please tell me what to do...i mean..i know its kinda like Admin's...i already got rid of droping and trading..but they still lose items on death...and im pretty sure i mite know the area..but i could use some extra help.. Anyone know?

item.title: Making Spawners not lose items on death [PI]
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Okay folow these Steps it isent Really Hard

Click playerassistant.java and Find this near ur Give life Void

if(c.duelStatus <= 4 && !c.getPA().inPitsWait()) { // if we are not in a duel we must be in wildy so remove items

below that u will see

if (!c.inPits && c.playerRights != 3) {

Again under that Paste if (!c.inPits && c.playerRights != 2) {

–X1

Read full topic
item.source: Making Spawners not lose items on death [PI]
